original_title: Suspect killed in Police STF shootout
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – One person was killed in a shootout by the Police Special Task Force on Wednesday (19) night.
The Police had opened fire at the suspect, who attempted to shoot a Police officer during an operation to arrest him.
He was a wanted suspect over several shooting incidents reported in Colombo.
In the meantime, an STF officer who was injured in the incident is currently receiving treatment at the Gampaha Hospital.
